snippet.title: Lessons with Chii-chan - Official Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Kouta, a timid university student is tasked with tutoring the outgoing yet dense Chieri to help her get through her exams. However, they couldn't be more different. Find out what hijinks ensue in Lessons With Chii-chan!

Lessons with Chii-chan will release on March 13 on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1217570/Lessons_with_Chiichan/

Follow us:

Publisher Page: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/Kagura

Group Page: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/kaguragames

Twitter: https://twitter.com/KaguraGames

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kagura.games/

Discord: https://discord.gg/yumBF94

Website: https://www.kaguragames.com
